short_summary: Note: This procurement is set apart for Indigenous business.
description: - Information Management (IM)/Information Technology (IT) professional resource services.
full_summary:
====================================

## Cloud Center of Excellence Professional Services
----------------------------------------------

### Tender Announcement
----------------------

**Reference:** cb-4803-11060354
**Amendment:** 2
**Procurement Number:** 100022614
**Publication Date:** April 18, 2023
**Closing Date:** May 9, 2023, 2:00 PM EST
**Amendment Date:** May 9, 2023
**Estimated Contract Duration:** June 1, 2023, to May 31, 2025

### Project Description
-----------------------

The Innovation, Transformation, and Technology Branch (IITB) of Employment and Social Development Canada (ESDC) requires services from a provider with expertise in Information Management (IM) and Information Technology (IT) to support the implementation and adoption of Canada’s cloud strategy and become a cloud-native department.

### Notice Type
----------------

This is a Request for Proposal (RFP), solicited under a Supply Arrangement.

### Procurement Method
----------------------

A competitive, selective tendering process will be used to select the successful bidder.

### Evaluation Criteria
---------------------------

The evaluation will be based on a combination of technical merit and price.

### Important Details
----------------------

*   **Multiple Attachments:** Attachments 1 and 2 (see links below) are available at the tender notice URL: [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/4803/100022614-npp_0.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/4803/100022614-npp_0.pdf), [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/4803/100022614-npp.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/4803/100022614-npp.pdf)
*   **Country:** Canada
*   **Language:** Bilingual (English and French)
*   **Business Line or Sector:** Computer Services
*   **Sets-aside Program:** Federal government Set-aside Program for Indigenous Business.
*   **Procurement Metrics:**

    ***Vendor Services***
